title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using new Date('3/2/2005') as a value in the table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The filter should work without errors.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Apply a filter to a table using the value new Date('3/2/2005').
3. Save and preview the report.
4. Observe the error message: 'There are error(s) in Table: table8Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s))
detail: An error occurred in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.'
